def_en: A hazard is something which could be dangerous to you, your health or safety, or your plans or reputation.

def_cn: 使冒风险;使处于危险中
def_en: If you hazard someone or something, you put them into a situation which might be dangerous for them.

def_cn: 斗胆提出;作无把握猜测
def_en: If you hazard or if you hazard a guess, you make a suggestion about something which is only a guess and which you know might be wrong.
